description: Update a service type unit of measure cohort.
permissions: User must be authorized to update the associated customer (per the service type unit of measure cohort policy).
side_effects: Updates a service type unit of measure cohort.
validation_notes: The cohort ID argument is required. At least one attribute or relationship must be provided. Trigger must be unique per customer. Service type unit of measure IDs must be unique, refer to existing service type unit of measures, and cannot include the trigger when provided. Name must be unique per customer when provided.

flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure-ids
flags.description: Service type unit of measure IDs (comma-separated or repeated)

flags.name: --trigger
flags.description: Trigger service type unit of measure ID
